greenmirror.fxpropertywrappers

Class PaintFxProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenmirror.FxPropertyWrapper
      • greenmirror.fxpropertywrappers.PaintFxProperty

  • public class PaintFxProperty
extends FxPropertyWrapper
    A wrapper for the Paint type of FX properties.
    Author:
    Karim El Assal

    • Method Detail

      • getPropertyType

        public @NonNull java.lang.Class<?> getPropertyType()
        Description copied from class: FxPropertyWrapper
        Returns the property type, which should be equal to the setter type when this property is set at an FX node. For example: if an FxPropertyWrapper subclass is created for wrapping double properties of any JavaFX node, this method should return double.class. The JavaFX node could have a method setRotate(double), so the subclass is a perfect wrapper for the rotate property.
        Specified by:
        getPropertyType in class FxPropertyWrapper
        Returns:
        the property type

      • cast

        public javafx.scene.paint.Paint cast(java.lang.Object instance)
        Description copied from class: FxPropertyWrapper
        Casts instance to the type represented by this FxPropertyWrapper. The cast, returned value should have no trouble being passed to the set method of this FxPropertyWrapper. For example, when a set method accepts double values, this method can return a Double type. The overriding method should have a return type more specific than the current Object.
        Specified by:
        cast in class FxPropertyWrapper
        Parameters:
        instance - the instance of the property. Usually this is received from a (JSON) map
        Returns:
        the cast instance; null if instance is null or the instance could not be cast

      • castToMapValue

        public java.lang.String castToMapValue(java.lang.Object instance)
        Description copied from class: FxPropertyWrapper
        Casts instance to a type that can be represented by "stringifiable" map, such as a JSON map.
        Specified by:
        castToMapValue in class FxPropertyWrapper
        Parameters:
        instance - the instance of the object
        Returns:
        the cast instance. Usually this is a String, an Integer or a Double. Returns null if instance is null.
